attributes.action: Stop the outgoing prime minister's privilege of a resignation honours list.
attributes.additional_details: Government and Parliament must prevent the resignation honours list from happening, otherwise they will have set a new low morel standard for all future prime ministers.
attributes.background: The government should review why the outgoing prime minister resignations honours list is allowed to take place as he has been found to have been unfit for his post. Allowing this to take place, sets a very poor example of the morels needed in government.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions relating to honours and appointments. 

We could accept a petition calling for a ban on resignation honours in all cases, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
